segments.text: Hey , Benjamin , have you finished your report on the project ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet . To tell you the truth , I don't know how to write it . I've considered it for several days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? Man , you don't know how to write a project report ? That's sounds a little bit ridiculous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't laugh at me , please . I'm serious . I've never been required to write this kind of report before , I only do the research reports .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sorry , I've totally forgotten that you are a workaholic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what items must be involved in this report ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First is your final conclusion on your work of this year , and then comes your plan for the next year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see , no , you have to include more details about your final conclusion , for example , your experiences in dealing with some emergent events .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And only that doesn't make a perfect one , you also have to pay attention to the format of the report .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God , is there any fixed for mat for it-the one that I just need to fix my information in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . There isn't . Because different people have to write different kinds of reports .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don't know how to work the Microsoft Words . Could you please give me a hand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , no problem . But you have to learn it and then do it yourself next time .
segments.speaker: S1
